content:
**EXISTING STRUCTURES**

### Electricity Generator at Position (10, 20)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (10, 21)
- Boiler at position (11, 20)
- Offshore Pump at position (9, 20)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (15, 25)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 26) and a Furnace at position (16, 26)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 27) and a Furnace at position (16, 27)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 28) and a Furnace at position (16, 28)

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (20, 30)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (20, 31) and a Furnace at position (21, 31)
- Assembling Machine at position (22, 30) and Inserter at position (21, 30) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup at position (21, 31) that connects the Furnace at position (21, 31) to the Assembling Machine at position (22, 30)

**ERROR TIPS**

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors in Assembling Machine Configuration
- Verify that the correct recipe is selected in the assembling machine to avoid production issues.

### Errors in Inserter Placement
- Ensure inserters are correctly oriented and positioned to pick up and place items as intended.

### Errors in Power Connection
- Check that all machines requiring power are connected to the power grid to ensure they function properly.
